metadata.title: CVE-2019-17528 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in Bento4 1.5.1.0. There is a SEGV in the functionAP4_TfhdAtom::SetDefaultSampleSize at Core/Ap4TfhdAtom.h when called fromAP4_Processor::ProcessFragments in Core/Ap4Processor.cpp.

criterions.comment: kodi-inputstream-adaptive package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
